We will also require some Day Works, to Backfill & Seal the Footpath.

properties.title: opp. 284 Main Rd. Redcliffs.
properties.publicdescription:
opp. 284 Main Rd. Redcliffs.
I.L.S. are Upgrading the Underground Power Supply here, & this will be done by Underground Thrusting from the ORION Sub-Station across & under the Road, to a Joint Pit on the water side of the road, to install ducting & the required cables. I will have a Shoulder Closed TM Setup on each side of the road too accomadate all of our requirements here. This Joint Pit will be fenced off & covered each night. There is a Footpath on the water side, which has a permanent fence here, we will not affect this & Pedestrians will be able to still use it at all times.

properties.title: Chalmers Street - Road Closure
properties.address: 35 - 39 Chalmers Street, The Hub Hornby, Hornby, Christchurch
properties.publicdescription: A full road closure will be required to allow for various works at the entrance to The Hub Hornby Mall. A full Road closure will be in place, however vehicles will have access into the warehouse car park from Both ends of Chalmers Street. A L1 STMS will be on site for the duration of the work. This is nightshift work and will be carried out each night between the 31 July to 12 August Inclusive. Closure in place from 11:30PM to 5:15AM. Road will be reopened daily between 5:15AM and 11:30PM as usual
